It has a particularly unhealthy fascination with eyeballs and things resembling eyeballs, such as pickled onions, walnuts and olives. ---- “The Hatter opened his eyes very wide on hearing this; but all he said was ‘Why is a raven like a writing-desk?’”
-Lewis Carroll, Alice’s Adventures in Wonderland}} ==Useful Info== '''Ravens''' are fast, flying pests that deal relatively low damage. They are occasionally a welcome sight, as they sometimes spawn in a small [[vault]] that contains a few pieces of shiny [[jewellery]] they've collected, but they also appear as an accompaniment to various [[list of tengu|tengu]] or in defense of a [[shambling mangrove]]. ==Tips & Tricks== *Ravens are generally less dangerous than the monsters they accompany, but don't let that fool you into thinking they're harmless -- lightly armored characters in particular should watch out for them. *Try to limit how much of the flock can reach you at one time by retreating to a chokepoint. Area-of-effect spells like [[Fireball]] or the cloud spells can help take them down more swiftly. ==History== Ravens were removed in [[0.17]].
